languages.text: {n}Клешня на мехадендрите Паскаля звучно клацает. Визор издает серию щелчков, переключая спектр наблюдения. Руки техножреца сами тянутся к комби-инструменту на поясе, пока глаза неотрывно следят за умирающим существом.{/n}

{n}The claw on Pasqal's mechadendrite clangs loudly. The visor emits a series of clicks, switching the observation spectrum. Pasqal's hands automatically reach for the combi-tool on his belt even as his eyes closely watch the dying creature.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Клешня на мехадендрите Паскаля звучно клацает. Визор издает серию щелчков, переключая спектр наблюдения. Руки техножреца сами тянутся к комби-инструменту на поясе, пока глаза неотрывно следят за умирающим существом.{/n}

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルの機械触手の爪が大きく鳴る。バイザーがカチカチと音を立て、観測スペクトルが切り替わる。パスカルは瀕死の生き物をジッと見ながらも、その手は自動的にベルトのコンボツールに伸びていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The claw on Pasqal's mechadendrite clangs loudly. The visor emits a series of clicks, switching the observation spectrum. Pasqal's hands automatically reach for the combi-tool on his belt even as his eyes closely watch the dying creature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの機械触手の爪が大きく鳴る。バイザーがカチカチと音を立て、観測スペクトルが切り替わる。パスカルは瀕死の生き物をジッと見ながらも、その手は自動的にベルトのコンボツールに伸びていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡机械触须上的爪子发出了响亮的咔嚓声，面甲也发出了一连串咔哒声，不断地切换着观测光谱。尽管帕斯卡的目光密切注视着这只垂死的生物，他的手却不由自主地伸向了腰带上的组合工具。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The claw on Pasqal's mechadendrite clangs loudly. The visor emits a series of clicks, switching the observation spectrum. Pasqal's hands automatically reach for the combi-tool on his belt even as his eyes closely watch the dying creature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡机械触须上的爪子发出了响亮的咔嚓声，面甲也发出了一连串咔哒声，不断地切换着观测光谱。尽管帕斯卡的目光密切注视着这只垂死的生物，他的手却不由自主地伸向了腰带上的组合工具。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La garra de la mecadendrita de Pasqal repiquetea con fuerza. El visor emite una serie de chasquidos, cambiando el espectro de observación. Las manos de Pasqal echan mano automáticamente a la combiherramienta que lleva en el cinturón, mientras sus ojos observan atentamente a la criatura moribunda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The claw on Pasqal's mechadendrite clangs loudly. The visor emits a series of clicks, switching the observation spectrum. Pasqal's hands automatically reach for the combi-tool on his belt even as his eyes closely watch the dying creature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La garra de la mecadendrita de Pasqal repiquetea con fuerza. El visor emite una serie de chasquidos, cambiando el espectro de observación. Las manos de Pasqal echan mano automáticamente a la herramienta que lleva en el cinturón, mientras sus ojos observan atentamente a la criatura moribunda.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Klaue an Pasqals Mechadendriten klappert laut. Der Visor stößt eine Reihe von Klicks aus und wechselt das Beobachtungsspektrum. Pasqals Hände greifen automatisch nach dem Kombiwerkzeug an seinem Gürtel, während seine Augen die sterbende Kreatur ganz genau beobachten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The claw on Pasqal's mechadendrite clangs loudly. The visor emits a series of clicks, switching the observation spectrum. Pasqal's hands automatically reach for the combi-tool on his belt even as his eyes closely watch the dying creature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Klaue an Pasqals Mechadendriten klappert laut. Der Visor stößt eine Reihe von Klicks aus und wechselt das Beobachtungsspektrum. Pasqals Hände greifen automatisch nach dem Kombiwerkzeug an seinem Gürtel, während seine Augen die sterbende Kreatur ganz genau beobachten.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La griffe de la mécadendrite de Pasqal claque bruyamment et son viseur émet une série de clics alors qu'il change de spectre d'observation. Tout en continuant d'observer attentivement la créature agonisante, Pasqal saisit le multi-outil pendu à sa ceinture.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The claw on Pasqal's mechadendrite clangs loudly. The visor emits a series of clicks, switching the observation spectrum. Pasqal's hands automatically reach for the combi-tool on his belt even as his eyes closely watch the dying creature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La griffe de la mécadendrite de Pasqal claque bruyamment et son viseur émet une série de clics alors qu'il change de spectre d'observation. Tout en continuant d'observer attentivement la créature agonisante, Pasqal saisit le multi-outil pendu à sa ceinture.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın mekadentritindeki pençe gürültüyle tıngırdıyor. Vizör, bir dizi tıkırtı çıkararak gözlem spektrumuna geçiş yapıyor. Pasqal'ın gözleri ölen yaratığı yakından izlerken, elleri otomatik olarak kemerindeki kombi gerece uzanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The claw on Pasqal's mechadendrite clangs loudly. The visor emits a series of clicks, switching the observation spectrum. Pasqal's hands automatically reach for the combi-tool on his belt even as his eyes closely watch the dying creature.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın mekadentritindeki pençe gürültüyle tıngırdıyor. Vizör, bir dizi tıkırtı çıkararak gözlem spektrumuna geçiş yapıyor. Pasqal'ın gözleri ölen yaratığı yakından izlerken, elleri otomatik olarak kemerindeki kombi gerece uzanıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
